## getDirTree() function

Recursively search for content in a given directory.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function getDirTree(fsPath: string): TreeNode[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fsPath | string | Path to the directory to scan. |

<b>Returns:</b>

[TreeNode](./markdown-magic-utils.treenode.md)<!-- -->\[\]

The directory content as a [TreeNode](./markdown-magic-utils.treenode.md) array.
